summary:
Giant As Follower Equipped with a Headsman Axe
All Shouts/Perks/Spells/Powers including All DLC\'s Shouts/Spells/Powers
Alot of DLC Weapons and Armor
Requires: DragonBorn,Dawnguard,HearthFire DLCS
descriptionHtml:
You Just Killed The People in the Room Trying To Get a Potion out of the Barrel During the Helgen Dragon Attack by Alduin....
You Are Equipped with the best DLC Armor and Practically Invincible..
You Also Have a Follower Whos a Giant About as Tall as you equipped with a Axe instead of a Club..
Your Perk Tree is Set and Your Health Stamina and Magicka Are Aswell..
*/!\\*Requires: DragonBorn,Dawnguard,HearthFire DLCS*/!\\*
author: KiddSleazy
